resources.string: This application utilizes Open Sound Control (OSC). You will need the IP Address of whatever device you are playing VRChat. You will also need to enable OSC within VRChat. For information on how to enable OSC, please visit https://docs.vrchat.com/docs/osc-overview#enabling-it.
It\'s advised to have the Push-To-Talk reflect VRChat\'s settings.
This section is to be used with the \"Mudskippy\'sJukebox\" JavaScript program. If you don\'t know what I\'m talking about, you\'re on the wrong Github branch.
For advanced users only! If you\'re not familiar with Open Sound Control, then you may want to leave this menu alone.
A button for the previous video.
A button for the next video.
A button for toggling the video being played or paused.
A button for restarting the current video.
